item.title: Why You May Want to Cheer for Money-Market Funds
item.description: Money funds remain an attractive place for excess cash, and can help keep a lid on short-term borrowing costs.

item.title: Two-year U.S. manufacturing slump shows little sign of ending
item.description: Durable-goods orders fall for third time in four months. Report comes out a day early following Christmas Eve executive order by Biden.
